post.body: As a rule I do, but seemed to have trouble switching off this weekend. Dunno how I'll cope with Christmas off! Will manage ;-)
Glad you approve! There's much more of the same, so it should keep you happy for a while ;-)
Ah, sorry. Hadn't been awake long ;-) Website is blog based, though, so you see all of that on the homepage, as you'll now know.
www.garymurning.com
My website features writing related articles, stuff that amuses/irritates me, science and atheism, plus the occasional rant!
LOL. Yes, of course you can say that. How are you, by the way. You've been quite.
Glad you liked it, mate! Good to see that the industry is cottoning onto the transience of all that celebrity nonsense :-)
Kirsty rocked!
Thank you, I really appreciate that. Anything you like in particular?
@twitmastwee Thank you both for that latest WBC nonsense. Those crackpots would be funny if they won't so deranged.
Treat for you: http://tinyurl.com/5ntr4n
A little of what you fancy does you good, my nan used to say.
Thanks, mate -- glad you enjoyed it. Hope your Sunday's been a good one!
Mouth's watering now!
I was going to read that, but something came up ;-)
Fortunately I'm very fond of coal...
Hope you enjoy it!
Oh yeeeesss? So, how well do you know him? ;-)
Without wishing to be disrespectful, your Santa is quite clearly a wuss :-D
Yes, but you do boring with such style ;-)
Milk? That isn't the Santa I know! He's strictly a sherry man... I can't believe I'm having this conversation... *shakes head*
Thief!
We've just shot up to 51.8 °F... see, I CAN Google "temperature conversion"! lol
Tomorrow should see me hit 20,000 words. Then a few rewrites and a relaxing Christmas -- whether I like it or not! LOL
It's been a lazy weekend. I'm not sure I like lazy weekends.
Feeling especially dopey today.
Richard Dawkins: An Interview with Derren Brown: http://tinyurl.com/67sx42
What Editors Want: http://tinyurl.com/5w42qa #writing #novel #author #fiction #literature
Yes, another thousand words completed... have now promised myself a full two days off... we'll see LOL.
Another great comment over on the authonomy website regarding Children of the Resolution!
This morning fatigue distorted my critical faculties. The opening for chapter 3 sucked (I thought.) After minor edits, and a rest, it rocks!
My Holiday Gift to You: http://tinyurl.com/a9ggrz
Edits all complete. Christmas starts here... or maybe I should just write chapter 4, first...
The final of Strictly Come Dancing. I'm sad, I know, but I don't care who wins... as long as it isn't Tom!
Disrespectful, Innit? (Actually, No, It Isn’t.): http://tinyurl.com/3u322n
This morning has mostly been spent working on edits, staring out of the window and contemplating binary opposition in fiction.
Have just spent a pleasant couple of hours reading John Wyndham's The Chrysalids. #novels #science #fiction #fantasy
It wouldn't have made sense 20 years ago: "I had to turn off the snow because it was messing up the loading of my page".
Coming in a Big Black Cadillac: http://tinyurl.com/3zfnhj #Elvis #Presley #Christmas
Pleniloquence... not guilty... no, really, I must protest, I am veritably pauciloquent, and make no mistake about it I would never --
